The viral image of two Coca: Cola bottles with the text "Kisan Ekta" and "Support Farmer" is being widely shared on social media.
The image was posted by a Facebook page: AggBani" and has gained over 1,900 shares.
The caption accompanying the image claim: Cola has come out to support the farmers' protest.
The public relations officer of Coca: Cola India has clarified that the company has not launched any brand campaign in support of the farmers' protest and that the viral image is a misrepresentation of their brand.
